sentence.Network_en: Aunt Petunia looked as though she'd just swallowed a lemon.
sentence.Network_cn: 帕特尼亚看起来像刚刚咽下了一个柠檬.

sentence.Network_en: Petunia: So he can't really be charged with burglary.
sentence.Network_cn: 佩图尼亚: 然则不能控告他入屋盗窃.

sentence.Network_en: Petunia Dersley : Cook breakfast. And try not to burn anything.
sentence.Network_cn: 佩妮·德思礼: 快去煮早餐, 不准烧焦东西.

list.abs: the Tanabata sat watching petunia vega , folk custom , is passed , annually in the night sky , was built in to meet with the cowherd fairies .七夕坐看牵牛织女星，是民间的习俗，相传，在每年的这个夜晚，是天上织女与牛郎在鹊桥相会之时。
佩妮姨妈(petunia dursley)——喇叭花色(p:petunia)  喇叭花色,代表着善妒、憎恨。佩妮的妹妹莉莉在家里得宠是显而易见的,这不可避免的增长了佩妮的嫉妒心,这种.

derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, from French petun, from Guarani petȳ 'tobacco' (to which these plants are related)

entry.def: A petunia is a type of garden plant with pink, white, or purple flowers shaped like short, wide cones.

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous tropical herbs having fluted funnel-shaped flowers

sentences.en: The petunias were already wilting in the hot sun.
sentences.cn: 在烈日下矮牵牛花已经开始枯萎了。
